featured.title: Top 10 Micro Niches You Can Start a Website On in 2025 (I've Tested 6 of These)
featured.description: Forget competing with giants in 'fitness' or 'finance.' These 10 micro niches have low competition, passionate audiences, and real monetization potential. I've personally tested 6 of them with surprising results.

featured.id: articles/What No One Tells You About Starting a Website in 2025
featured.title: What No One Actually Tells You About Starting a Website in 2025 (I Learned the Hard Way)
featured.description: After launching 12 websites over 3 years (and watching 8 of them fail), here are the brutal truths no one mentions in those glossy tutorials. Real talk about what it actually takes to build something that matters.
